TopicTitle: A lightweight, stock VTOL: the Bee

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I'm Wulfg4r, a fresh recruit of this crazy space program

I would like to share with you my latest creation, a (fairly) stable and ultralight (6.0t) VTOL made only with stock parts (27).

I present you the Bee:

If anyone is interested to tweak some more, here's the .craft file:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/2tqxkaux1lnwv7q/Bee%20VTOL%20V2.craft?dl=0

Share your thoughts and questions!

- Wulf

Hi! and welcome to the Forum and KSP.

A VTOL is not an easy craft so kudos on a nice first posting! Check out some of Cupcake's VTOL's you can improve the response of the lift engine with a clipped mini mainsail engine.
